rev.comment: rm sub-section on controversies; re-add link. All a sub-section here is going to do is invite conspiracy theorists to insert crap and inflate the size of the article.

Google was added to the [[Standard & Poor's]] 500 index ([[S&P 500]]) on [[March 31]], [[2006]]. Google replaced [[Burlington Resources]], a major oil producer based in [[Houston]] which was acquired by [[ConocoPhillips]].

As it has grown, Google has found itself the focus of various controversies related to its business practices and services, including issues of [[copyright]], [[censorship]] of search results, and user [[privacy]].
